org.epics.util.time

Class TimeParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.epics.util.time.TimeParser

  • public class TimeParser
extends Object
    A helper class to parse user defined time strings to absolute or relative time durations. The following return a TimeInterval - absolute "last min", "last hour", "last day", "last week" "last 5 mins", "last 5 hours", "last 5 days", "last 5 weeks" "5 mins ago", "5 hours ago", "5 days ago", "5 weeks ago" The following returns a Timestamp "now" The following returns a TimeDuration - relative "last min", "last hour", "last day", "last week" "last 5 mins", "last 5 hours", "last 5 days", "last 5 weeks" "5 mins ago", "5 hours ago", "5 days ago", "5 weeks ago"
    Author:
    shroffk
